name: Elon's Dream
description:
The conquest of Mars is the dream of every person who dreams of space. And now, one of the greatest minds of our time, having created a commercial space technology company Myspace, launches its rocket to Mars, and... Is broken on it. Now he is left alone with a deserted planet, must at all costs survive and find a way back home.

In your hands is given control of a would-be astronaut who is looking for a way to get out of the ill-fated red planet. Use your jetpack to jump from platform to platform, keeping your balance and balance in an unfamiliar atmosphere, and remember that despite the low-gravity conditions, it's still easy to crash here. Oh, Yes, it is important not to forget that the jetpack's fuel reserves are limited, so be careful and economical during the flight!
